biography.bio: Francis Chun-Yu Ng was born on December 21, 1961 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and director, known for Exilé (2006), Infernal Affairs II (2003) and The mission (1999). He has been married to Fiona Wong Lai-Ping since December 2, 2002.
biography.name: Francis Chun-Yu Ng

biography.bio: Loletta Lee was born on January 8, 1966 in Kwangchow, China as Lee Lai Chun. She is an actress, known for Zui hou sheng li (1987), Gwai ma hau yuen (1987) and Wong Kok cha 'fit' yan (1996).
biography.name: Loletta Lee

biography.bio: Airi Ando is an actress, known for Wong Kok cha 'fit' yan (1996) and Kaseifu ha mita (1997).
biography.name: Airi Ando

biography.bio: Born in Shanghai, China, as Pinyin Chen Baolian, Pauline Chan emigrated to Hong Kong at age 12 with her mother when her parents divorced. A beautiful young girl, it didn't take long for photographers and agents to notice her and she began modeling at 15. In 1990 she entered the Miss Asia beauty pageant. She didn't win, but her striking looks, lithe body and classy bearing attracted the attention of several producers in Hong Kong's adult film industry. At age 18 she made her adult-film debut and her enthusiastic performances shot her to the top of the Chinese porn field. In 1997 she hooked up with a much older man, a Taiwanese millionaire, and they had a short (two-year) but stormy relationship. After their break-up in 1999, Chan's personal and professional lives began to unravel. She had had a drug problem for several years and it got worse--during one television interview in which she was apparently high on drugs she actually tried to commit suicide. A series of brushes with the law ensued, resulting in her being deported from several countries, and she was briefly sent to prison in the UK for assault. These and other incidents pretty much pulled the plug on her film career. She moved back to her hometown of Shanghai and in July of 2002 gave birth to a baby boy. Motherhood didn't solve her problems, however, and on July 31, 2002, she leaped out of the window of her 24th-floor apartment and plunged to her death.
biography.name: Pauline Chan

biography.bio: Wai-Man Chan was born on July 10, 1946 in Hong Kong. He is known for his work on Dragon Strike (1982), Chinese Hercules (1973) and Legacy of Rage (1986).
biography.name: Wai-Man Chan

biography.bio: Sing Chen was born on March 17, 1940 in Singapore. He is known for his work on New Fists of Fury (1976), Double Impact (1991) and Bruce Li the Invincible Chinatown Connection (1978).
biography.name: Sing Chen

biography.bio: Farini Cheung is an actress, known for Wan 9 zhao 5 (1994), Vengeance (2009) and Chi luo kuang ben (1993).
biography.name: Farini Cheung

biography.bio: Richard Da Silva is an actor, known for Wo yao jin gui xu (1986), Wong Kok cha 'fit' yan (1996) and Dangerous Encounters of the First Kind (1980).
biography.name: Richard Da Silva

biography.bio: Pak-Kwong Ho is known for his work on Mimic (1997), Ginger Snaps (2000) and The Corruptor (1999).
biography.name: Pak-Kwong Ho

biography.bio: Danny Ko is a director and actor, known for Painted Skin (2008), The Journey of Flower (2015) and Er yue san shi (1995).
biography.name: Danny Ko

biography.bio: Kee-To Lam is a writer and actor, known for The Bride with White Hair (1993), The Swordsman (1990) and A Chinese Ghost Story II (1990).
biography.name: Kee-To Lam

biography.bio: Spencer Lam was born on November 7, 1934 in Hong Kong. He was an actor, known for Vampire Effect (2003), Young and Dangerous 3 (1996) and Ye boon saam dim jung (1997). He died on April 23, 2009 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Spencer Lam

biography.bio: Sammuel Leung was born on December 3, 1973 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and composer, known for Beast Cops (1998), Shou xing xin ren lei (2000) and That Demon Within (2014).
biography.name: Sammuel Leung

biography.bio: Jamie Luk is an actor and director, known for Rumble in the Bronx (1995), Endless Love (1993) and Driving Miss Wealthy (2004).
biography.name: Jamie Luk

biography.bio: Changjiang Pan was born on June 1, 1957 in Mudanjiang, Heilongjiang, China. He is an actor, known for The Emperor and the Assassin (1998), Adventure of the King (2010) and The Unfortunate Car (2012).
biography.name: Changjiang Pan

awards.award: Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards 1997

keywords: once upon a time in the title
